scripts.dev: npm run build -w @library-system/shared && concurrently -n shared,web,api "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:api"
scripts.docker:up: docker compose up -d --build postgres redis api web
scripts.docker:demo: npm run docker:up && npm run docker:seed
scripts.docker:scale: npm run docker:up && npm run docker:seed:scale
scripts.docker:reset: npm run docker:down:volumes && npm run docker:demo
scripts.docker:test: npm run docker:reset && npm run docker:smoke
scripts.build: npm run build -w @library-system/shared && npm run build -w @library-system/api && npm run build -w @library-system/web
